messages.subject: shot for homeschooling? (was Re: 2283 - who "Owns" our children?)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/26/02 8:27:59 PM, zenmomma@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/26/02 8:27:59 PM, zenmomma@... writes:

<< There *was* a standoff and shootout at a Utah home in the 1970's. >>

Thanks, Mary.

I would still like for Ned to give us the details HE knows, because if he's
going to be going around asserting simply that someone was shot for
homeschooling he should have the facts right at hand. And I'm a day behind
on e-mail, so maybe he has done so, but if he does NOT answer this question
and some others pretty soon, I'm going to request that he be removed from
this list. It's over a dozen questions now, I'm sure, that people have asked
Ned directly that he has just flatly ignored. If he's going to pour
vitriolic rhetoric over us all with NO attempt at responsibility for the
"facts" he's presenting, I think it is vastly more damaging than it's worth.

I might not get my way if I ask, and that's fine. But I'm past tired of the
one-way "information."

The world is a big place. The internet is a big place. People who want Ned
can find him very easily.

Sandra
